entry.title: There’s a Problem With Senator Lummis’ Bitcoin Reserve Plan, Cato Institute Expert Says
entry.summary: George Selgin explains how the U.S. government could fund the purchase of 1 million BTC—and what it might mean for the Fed.

entry.title: ‘Hamster Kombat’ Airdrop Delayed as Pre-Market Trading for Telegram Game Expands
entry.summary: The makers of Hamster Kombat say they’re “actively working” to launch the token—but it sure doesn’t appear to be coming in July.

entry.title: Ethereum ETFs Boost Crypto Fund Trading Volume as Bitcoin Retains ‘Healthy’ Interest
entry.summary: Crypto fund weekly trading volume reached the highest level since May thanks to the launch of spot Ethereum ETFs.

entry.title: Here Are Today's ‘Hamster Kombat’ Daily Combo and Cipher Code
entry.summary: Looking for the daily combo and cipher code for Monday, July 29? Here’s what you need to make bank in Telegram game Hamster Kombat.

entry.title: Meme Coin Drama Erupts Over Dogecoin Pup Owner’s New Shiba Inu Neiro
entry.summary: Neiro, the newly-adopted Shiba Inu of the owner behind the Dogecoin-inspiring Kabosu, has triggered a battle for meme coin supremacy.

entry.title: Bitcoin Price Volatility Triggers $185 Million in Crypto Liquidations
entry.summary: Wild price swings for Bitcoin—including after the U.S. government moved $2 billion in BTC tied to Silk Road—have caused serious bleeding.

entry.title: Wall Street Loves Ethereum ETFs. It’s Just Not Sure How to Sell Them Yet
entry.summary: At a bell ringing ceremony hosted by Bitwise at the New York Stock Exchange on Friday, bankers and analysts grappled with the debut of spot ETH ETFs—and how best to understand them.

entry.title: US Government Moves $2 Billion in Silk Road Bitcoin
entry.summary: Just days after Trump vowed that the U.S. would "keep 100%" of seized Bitcoin if elected, the government just moved $2 billion in BTC tied to Silk Road.

entry.title: Bitcoin Fees Near Yearly Low as BTC Price Taps $70,000
entry.summary: Bitcoin touched a price of $70,000 per coin early Monday as network fees continue to fall, nearing a one-year low under a dollar.

entry.title: Olive Branch From Kamala Harris to Crypto Is 'A Tad Late', Says Bernstein
entry.summary: Bernstein is still very bullish on mining: “We expect top 5 Bitcoin miners to be 25% of Bitcoin’s global network hashrate by 2025,” the report states.

entry.title: How Solana Meme Coin Billy Survived Being Abandoned by Its Dev
entry.summary: Billy was abandoned by his dev who deleted all social media accounts. But the community took over, pushing the token to a $200 million market cap.

entry.title: Bitcoin Policy Competition Between China and US Would Benefit Industry, Says Justin Sun
entry.summary: "If China were to take a similar path, it could lead to healthy competition between the two economic powerhouses,” an expert told Decrypt.

entry.title: SEC Approves Grayscale Bitcoin Mini Trust to Trade on NYSE Arca
entry.summary: GBTC holders will see a part of their holdings be converted to the new fund, but the company explained that this is not expected to constitute a taxable event.

entry.title: Hong Kong Lawmaker Latest to Push for Strategic Bitcoin Reserve
entry.summary: Legislative Council member Johnny Ng called for Hong Kong to “research and consider” including Bitcoin in strategic financial reserves.

entry.summary: Investors aren't expecting the Fed to cut rates on Wednesday, but "a rate cut indication on July 31 could push Bitcoin above $70,000," say analysts.

entry.title: Cynthia Lummis' Home State of Wyoming to Launch Bitcoin Research Institute
entry.summary: The institute will focus on producing "high-quality” studies on Bitcoin, aiming to close knowledge gaps stemming from misguided research.

entry.title: Compound Finance Proposal Passes Sparking Concerns Over ‘Governance Attack’
entry.summary: The move, though legal within Compound Finance's DAO rules, was called out by community members and experts following its passage on Sunday.

entry.title: Bitcoin Above $69,000 as Inflation Shows Signs of Easing Ahead of Fed Meeting
entry.summary: Rate cuts could help lift crypto prices as borrowing becomes cheaper for investors ahead of the U.S. presidential elections in November.

entry.title: Unbound Launches a Bitcoin Avenue to EU Citizenship
entry.summary: The Portugal-based Unbound Fund is promoted as the world’s first Bitcoin-driven “golden visa” investment vehicle.

entry.title: Real-World Asset Tokenization Demands a Dedicated Blockchain, Says Mantra CEO
entry.summary: Tokenization of real estate and other assets could accelerate greatly, but Mantra CEO John Patrick Mullin believes that general-purpose chains aren't fit for the task.

entry.summary: Catch up on this week’s biggest crypto and NFT gaming news and find some weekend reads in our latest roundup.

entry.summary: Bing search results organized by AI, now in limited release, will feature prominent links to external sites.

entry.summary: The outspoken privacy advocate said elections historically haven't changed much, and meanwhile railed against the threat AI poses to citizens.

entry.summary: “We have thrown all of our instruments at this,” a NASA scientist tells Decrypt, but more study is needed to determine the origin.

entry.summary: The popular prediction market is taking wagers on the world’s biggest sports event.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 166 - CRYPTO AND STOCKS FALL
entry.summary: BTC ETFs: +$44m, ETH ETFs: -$133m. ETH falls as Grayscale ETF outflows continue. ETH ETFs still see $1bn of daily volume. Liquidations hit $250m in sell-off. ETH Open Interest hits ATH at CME. BTC whales have bought $23bn in July. SOL weekly active addresses hits ATH. Bitstamp to distribute Mt. Gox BTC today. Russia to legalise crypto mining & payments. Lummis set to introduce BTC strategic reserve bill. Harris will not be at Bitcoin Nashville. BTC going to $52m by 2050: VanEck. Hashdex file for mixed BTC & ETH ETF. Coinbase to make tokenised treasuries fund. Polymarket partners with Moonpay for on-ramp. Ferrari accepts crypto in Europe. Bitfarms stopped in poison-pill strategy. Riot buys another miner for $93m.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 165 - ETH ETFs TAKE IN 107M
entry.summary: BTC ETFs: -$78m, ETH ETFs: +$107m. BTC falls amid ETF outflows & Mt. Gox movements. ETH ETFs see ‘very solid’ first day $107m inflows. Grayscale ETH trust sees $484m outflow. ETH ETF volumes come out at 23% of BTC. Debate about whether strong flows will continue. SOL DEX volume continues to rise above ETH. Harris may also speak at Bitcoin Nashville. Harris could be far more open to Bitcoin: Cuban. BTC symbol lights up Vegas Sphere. Coinbase continues to pursue Gensler emails. dYdX explores sale of derivatives tech. dYdX site recovers after DNS attack. JD to create Hong Kong stablecoin. Bitwise uses ENS addresses for ETH ETFs. BlackRock applies for ENA cash allocation. Uber CEO wants to accept BTC.

Mt Gox moves $2.8bn BTC for distributions. US government moves $4m BTC to Coinbase. Bedford FC buys $4.5m BTC. Hamilton Lane launches private credit fund on SOL. CNBC discusses BTC reserve currency rumour. Polymarket sets another trading record. BlockFi administrator submits plan to repay customers. WLD denies insider trading and manipulation claims. India keeps high crypto taxes unchanged. Gate exchange exits Japan. Marathon Digital fined $138m for breaching NDA. HyperLend launches lending on HyperLiquid.

Mt Gox transfers to Bitstamp expected soon. Crypto sees $3.2bn fund inflows in 3 weeks. China company Boyaa buys $100m BTC. Polymarket saw $80m bets on Biden withdrawal. Polymarket 2024 volumes hit $500m. Elon appearance at Bitcoin Nashville rumoured. Combined SOL, BTC & ETH ETF coming: Geraci. Call skew heads to 2024 extremes in bullish sign. Plan B points to bullish setup in S2F model. Coinbase premium moves back to positive. Gensler likely resigns next year: 10x. Germany already lost $124m profit selling.

entry.title: What's the Meta? Do Crypto Degens Care About Being Scammed?
entry.summary: What's the Meta? With the rise of Pumpdotfun and rug pulls becoming a daily occurrence, why do crypto degens keep investing? Do these investors enjoy being scammed? It appears that people very often invest in meme coins that are very obviously going to rug pull. Once it happens, they just laugh it off on Twitter, is being scammed fun?!

entry.title: Zoltan Istvan on AI and Human Immortality
entry.summary: Transhumanist Party founder Zoltan Istvan chats with Decrypt's Emerging Technology report Jason Nelson about his journey with transhumanism, running for office, and why he fears AI is outpacing life science and poses a threat to the quest for immortality.

SOL stablecoin TVL soars on Tether & PYUSD growth. Firedancer sees the first accepted block on SOL testnet. ETH ETFs finally expected next week. Monthly active crypto addresses top 100m. Trump to speak at Bitcoin Nashville conference. Golman Sachs to launch 3 tokenization projects. Short squeeze in altcoins sees TIA rise 80% from lows. MOG leads top memes coins, BONK flips WIF. Farming interest shifts to Berachain & Monad.

entry.title: What's the Meta? Meet the Solana Dev Who Suffered Third Degree Burns to Pump a Token
entry.summary:
Meet Mikol: the Dare dev that doused himself in isopropyl alcohol and had fireworks shot at him. He instantly went up in flames and was rushed to hospital, where it became apparent he suffered third degree burns.
In this episode, Mikol reflects on the biggest night of his life, details his injuries, and the grueling recovery process he’s still in. Despite the traumatic incident, Mikol isn’t done with the project. Instead, he’s planning to build a decentralized app where community members can take on dares in exchange for DARE tokens.

Justin Sun says he is willing to buy German BTC. German MP calls on it to stop selling BTC. $52k super-trend support line eyed for BTC. Funding rates turn extremely negative across majors. Only 6 mining machines profitable below $56k. Coinbase spot buyers emerge to counter drop. Total3 hits RSI lows only hit 4 times in last 4 years. Fear & Greed index hits lowest since Jan 2023. Capo remains bullish. Real selling begins at $38k: Schiff. Coinbase continue to fight for Gensler’s emails. Circle mints $250m USDC on SOL. Symbiotic hits $1bn TVL.
